full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA H'A GU RU DRAG POR SGRUB PA'I GTOR CHOG GUM MCHOD SPYI GZUGS RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039B (CES 'PHRIN LAS BLO MOS GUS SHUGS DRAG PO'I BCOL, ,GTOR CHOG 'DI NI GUR DRAG GI TSOGS BZLAS PA'I 'PHRO, ,DE MA THAG TU BCUG LA BYA, TSOGS ZOR BA'I SKABS SU GONG GIS SNGAGS BZLAS PA'I PHR'O LA GTOR BTANG, DE NAS GTANG RANG GI MCHOD BSTOD BZOD GSOL BYA, MGRON GSHEGS SO GSOL BYED DPA BRTEN NAM BRIS SKU YOD PA'I TSE DE LA NAS BTAN BZHUGS BYED CING 'JIG RTEN PA'I MGRON BSGOM PAI TING NGE 'DZIN GYI DKYIL 'KHOR 'OD GSAL DU BSDUS LTAR LANGS THUN MTSANG SAm KYI RNAL 'BYOR SKYANG ZHING, ,BSNGO BA SMON LAM GYI BKRA SHIS KYI MTHA' BRGYAN PA SOGS GTER GSAR GUR DRAG GI LAS BYANG BYED, GTOR CHOG 'DIR NI RGYAL DBANG NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I LAS BYANG THOG MDA'I TSE DPAL NAS SPYAN DRANGS SHING, ZHAN KHA BSKONG 'GA' ZHIG GTER GSAR NAS BLANGS, ,'GA' ZHIG GSAR DU SGRIGS PA'I GTOR CHOG KUN KYANG MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LAM 'DI'I RNAL 'BYOR LA BRTZON PA'I RIG PA 'DZIN PA PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
